video.title: Real Husbands of Hollywood
video.synopsis: Kevin Hart and other real-life husbands of Hollywood celebrities play fictionalized versions of themselves in this reality-show spoof.

episodes.synopsis: Kevin kicks Nick out of weekly poker after a pie fight, and Nelly brings in replacement Robin Thicke -- the husband of Kevin's crush, Paula Patton.
episodes.title: Easy Bake Kevin

episodes.synopsis: Nelly tries to mediate Kevin's one-sided beef with Robin, and J.B. and Boris discover that Duane's new clothing factory has dubious labor practices.
episodes.title: Thicke and Tired

episodes.synopsis: In attempt to make more money, Kevin tries to get in on Nelly's investment in an exercise video, but Nelly wants only the other guys to join.
episodes.title: It's Gettin' Hot in Herrre

episodes.synopsis: After flirting with boxer "Sugar" Shane Mosley's girlfriend, Kevin fakes an ailment to avoid getting clobbered by the champ during a charity fight.
episodes.title: Karma's a Mitch

episodes.synopsis: Kevin "Fists of Funny" Hart squares off in the anticipated charity fight with professional boxer "Sugar" Shane Mosley.
episodes.title: Hart vs. Mosley

episodes.synopsis: Kevin tries to start a music career and upsets one of the husbands, and Duane's latest scheme causes Boris to run into an ex -- and into trouble.
episodes.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Mitches

episodes.synopsis: J.B. gets a spot on a hidden-camera prank show, and Kevin receives some unexpected news from a heartless friend with benefits.
episodes.title: Trick'd

episodes.synopsis: Kevin writes a tell-all book about the other husbands and his own ex-wife, but he doesn't exactly tell the complete truth.
episodes.title: Hollyhood Scuffle

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious blackmailer threatens to reveal incriminating "boys' night out" photos unless the guys perform a series of outrageous stunts.
episodes.title: Blackstabbers

episodes.synopsis: It's double-date night for Boris and Duane with their wives, and Kevin's special "double" date night with a pair of twins gets interrupted by Nick.
episodes.title: Retreat from Couples

episodes.synopsis: Kevin shows off his upgraded celebrity digs while Wanda Sykes hijacks his new home for a star-studded fundraiser.
episodes.title: Fund Raising Hell

episodes.synopsis: Wanda's fundraiser at Kevin's house continues, as Nick's donated Smart Car is auctioned off by JB.
episodes.title: Hell of a Fundraiser

episodes.synopsis: Kevin holds fake auditions to cast the girl worthy of his rising stardom.
episodes.title: Frauditions

episodes.synopsis: Tisha and Duane are excited about their new sitcom for Nick's NCredible Network, until the first joke to get cut is Duane's.
episodes.title: Tisha & Duane

episodes.synopsis: Oliver tries his hand at stand-up, and Kevin tries to unnerve him by inviting his friend Chris Rock to Oliver's open mic debut.
episodes.title: Rock Paper, Stealers

episodes.synopsis: Still looking for high-wattage love, Kevin joins a celebrity online dating service.
episodes.title: Hook, Lie & Sink Her

episodes.synopsis: With unsolicited help from Wayne Brady, Kevin tries to rekindle the flame with Selita on Wayne's talk show.
episodes.title: Outdated

episodes.synopsis: New celebrity "it" couple Kevin and Selita are crowned "Kevlita" by the media, and the buzz gets bigger when Selita reveals a baby bump.
episodes.title: Doing the Bump

episodes.synopsis: Tisha and Nicole reluctantly join forces with Eva Marcille, Nadine Velasquez and Bridgette to plan a promotional baby shower for Selita.
episodes.title: Scattered Shower

episodes.synopsis: A red carpet kicks off Kevin and Selita's baby shower TV special with plenty of shameless promotions and bad behavior.
episodes.title: Storm Showers

episodes.synopsis: Duane arranges a Gymboree public appearance on Kevin and Selita's baby bump promotional tour, while Trina tries to get Kevin to host the Oscars.
episodes.title: The Bump Stops Here

episodes.synopsis: After the Kevlita baby bump debacle, Selita talks to Katie Couric to get her groove and image back.
episodes.title: The Harter They Fall
